course.unavailable: The stream has not started yet. Please try again closer to the event start time.
settings.title: Device settings
devices.init.once: You only have to make this setting once.
devices.camera.blocked: Access to camera not possible. Make sure that no other application is accessing this camera.
devices.speaker: Speaker
devices.audio.input.init: For a speech, you need to select a microphone and give the browser permission to use it.
devices.audio.rec.test.description: The recording is only cached locally in the browser.
devices.permission: You need to grant permission to access audio and video devices.

course.feature.message.send.error.recipi: Participant not available: Failed to send message

course.feature.quiz.sent: Your answer has been successfully sent
course.speech.request.accepted.descripti: Start your speech now or cancel it if you have changed your mind.
course.recorded.modal.title: This course is being recorded
course.recorded.modal.message: The recording can be published later. As a digital event, this affects your contributions during active requests to speak.
entry.modal.title: Start media playback
entry.modal.description: To play audio and video, click Start.
reconnect.title: Connection interrupted
vpn.modal.title: Network Access
vpn.modal.description: In order to be able to watch streamed courses, you must have network access to the data network of the TU Darmstadt. All TU members have the following network access options:
vpn.modal.description.vpn: Secure connection into the TU network and access to services outside of the TU data network.
vpn.modal.description.wlan: Nearly full-coverage Internet access on campus and in the “darmstadtium” congress center.
vpn.modal.reconnect: Please reload the page after the connection has been successfully established.
